page.title: 07Leisure
page.content: In my Leisure time I like to ride my pony Molly at Crymlyn Manor.Jonathan my brother likes to ride his bike and play with his friend Timothy,he also likes to go running with dad.Dad goes running when ever he has time,every Tuesday he runs with my Grandfather in a club called Carmathen Harriers Doctor Hedydd Davies also runs in the club.Mum likes to knit,read the paper and tend to the flower beds and plants.Katy my sister likes to play withher friend Philippa and try to ride her bike.Mum and dad also help with the Rangers,Mum is an asistant leader and goes nearly every Tuesday, dad is the expeition leader and goes every other Tuesday,he is an officer in the Army Cadet Force.Mr. and Mrs. Evans,some family friends like to tend the garden and listen to the radio and some like to go for car spins.
